trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_GJUSANA_000_000<tab>The Trials of the Braves is a nine-volume work of literature which tells of the heroic feats of the Zodiac Braves.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_GJUSANA_000_001<tab>As I mentioned earlier, I'm willing to part with each book for the discounted price of 100 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 (( 28)) 0302 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>By defeating all the foes listed within a book of the Trials of the Braves, your relic weapon atma will gain in attributes.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Distinct sets of Trials of the Braves exist for each relic. A set is comprised of nine books, of which only four are available for exchange at first.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>A paladin's set comprises seven books for Curtana, and two for the Holy Shield. Only six of these are available for exchange at first.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>Each book can be purchased from G'jusana. Please note, however, that you can possess only one at any given time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>You must complete all of the objectives in a book before you may purchase another.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Alternately, you may also dispose of it by speaking with G'jusana, or via the Key Items menu.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025NOTETALK_00170_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>This concludes the explanation of the enhancement process. May your relic drink deep of the souls of your enemies!
